name: On And Off (Abstract Games)
description:
ONANDOFF is a small prototype of what could be a fun game. Made in 5 hours.

The aim of the game is to get as many balls through the red boxes as possible

You control the red boxes, turning them off or on with the keys 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5. Holding down a key turns that box off. Letting it go turns it back on. You want the balls to go through the box when its off.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE RULES : 

- TOGGLE with KEYS 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5.

- GET the HIGHEST SCORE

-TRY TO BEAT MY HIGH SCORE OF 86!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/itmustbejack/
